TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void PoppedDownHandler(object o, PoppedDownArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed PoppedDownHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the PoppedDownHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the PoppedDownHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the PoppedDownHandler is removed from the event.
